document.full_text: liao yiwu has been barred from leaving china to attend a literary festival next week in australia, festival officials said monday, in the latest sign of china's ongoing crackdown on domestic critics.
document.title: chinese crackdown on domestic critics extends to writer barred from traveling
lines_and_colors: liao yiwu has been barred from leaving china to attend a literary festival next week in australia, festival officials said monday, in the latest sign of china's ongoing crackdown on domestic critics.
